com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider

Class CognitoMfaSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.CognitoMfaSettings

  • public class CognitoMfaSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents user MFA settings in Cognito.

    Requires MFA name to instantiate. MFA enabled and preferred states are set to false by default.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.lang.String TOTP_MFA
